page.title: 07 THE PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content: Mr Cullimore,the farmer of Yew Tree Farm ,Newton,is chairman of the parish council.He has held that position for the last eight years.The parish council was formed ten years ago. There are 150 people in the parish, and therefore five members on the council.They are elected as in a national vote-people are put forward and a ballot is held if there are more than five nominees.If there are less, they are automatically elected.The ballot is arranged by the District Council and all the electors of the parish are eligible to vote. The usual subjects brought up at the parish council meetings is Highways,but lately ,the parish council has funded a party to celebrate 40 years of peace in Europe.
